question:
If economic globalisation is inevitable, it should primarily serve humanity rather than the interests of trans-national corporations. Please choose one and ONLY one: 
Strongly Disagree
Disagree
Agree
Strongly Agree

I’d always support my country, whether it was right or wrong. Please choose one and ONLY one: 
Strongly Disagree
Disagree
Agree
Strongly Agree

No one chooses their country of birth, so it’s foolish to be proud of it. Please choose one and ONLY one: 
Strongly Disagree
Disagree
Agree
Strongly Agree

The freer the market, the freer the people. Please choose one and ONLY one: 
Strongly Disagree
Disagree
Agree
Strongly Agree
